comment: Might be good poured over vanilla ice cream and a brownie
The Chocolate is too mild. More meek than mild, really.
Bought sample for a friend and choco-holic. You can really taste the choc, no burn, she liked it. Said she would like a shot of it in her morning coffee.
Surprisingly smooth with rich chocolate notes, without an artificial taste. Would be great in a morning or early afternoon coffee.
Brilliant taste, just too harsh to enjoy it for long.

Truly awful. My wife gave me a gift pack at Christmas with a 750ml bottle of their regular bourbon along with several mini bottles of various other flavored whiskies. Everything else was at least at least drinkable, if not particularly memorable. 

I don't "get" the trend of flavoring bourbons. Leave that crap to the cheap vodkas. This one tasted like chocolate syrup and cough syrup. 

Luckily, I had a bottle of Weller on hand so I could attempt to wash the taste out. It hasn't worked so far.
